name: Or Die trying
description:
A story about how dice tell stories, or maybe how the dice know more of the story than we do.

CONTENT WARNING
This game contains material about death, undeath, and having to kill loved ones. If any of these make you uncomfortable, please skip this game, or proceed with caution.

This game was created as part of the If(game)SH Summer Jam (held in conjunction with the GMTK jam), and is not finished. Not yet anyways.

The theme was: ROLL OF THE DICE
